nodes.bodyText: Why do we need this? From my understanding, this only stores a second reference to the same exercise?
We don't. Thanks for noticing, not sure why I did this anymore.
May I ask what is preventing you from using your ExerciseDetailsComponent here as well?

A few things: The programming exercise details has a few attributes which are either missing in the super exercise details (e.g. buildAndTestStudentSubmissionsAfterDueDate) and as well has a short name, which should imo directly follow the title. As well the problem statement and grading instructions are formatted differently.
Just added a commit, which tries to reuse as much of the component in that exercise detail page, too. Let me know what you think.
